did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Papers collected by Alan K. McAdams about the U.S. vs. IBM anti-trust case include a reasonably complete transcript of the trial; an additional copy of the transcript of McAdams' own testimony; exhibits used with McAdams' testimony; working papers and drafts used for the exhibits; depositions of other economists who appeared; other documents; and some personal files of Alan K. McAdams.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Alan K. McAdams is a professor of managerial economics at the Cornell Graduate School of Management, and was the chief economic witness for the government in the IBM anti-trust case.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Papers collected by Alan K. McAdams about the U.S. vs. IBM anti-trust case include a reasonably complete transcript of the trial; an additional copy of the transcript of McAdams' own testimony; exhibits used with McAdams' testimony; working papers and drafts used for the exhibits; depositions of other economists who appeared; other documents; and some personal files of Alan K. McAdams.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Alan K. McAdams. Papers, #4068. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

unittitle.extref: Link to a partial finding aid.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
